DOC.brief_summary: Review of clinical characteristics of patients who are prescribed Repatha® and how their treatment is managed.
DOC.brief_title: Chart Review of Repatha® in Subjects With Hyperlipidaemia
DOC.criteria: Adults (>18 years) Provided informed consent Initiated on Repatha® at physician's discretion, after 1st August 2015 Received at least one dose of Repatha® Enrolled in an interventional study of PCSK9 inhibitor within 12 weeks prior to initiation of Repatha®
